Draft Rating:

C+

Harry Weltman ranks in the 58th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Weltman's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 1 spot higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Mookie Blaylock with 12th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Hot Rod Williams with 45th pick but was worth 9th pick.
  • Drafted Paul Thompson with 50th pick but was worth 22th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Dennis Hopson with 3th pick but was worth 45th pick.
  • Drafted Chris Morris with 4th pick but was worth 8th pick.
  • Drafted Ron Anderson with 27th pick but was worth 50th pick.

Trade Rating:

D

Harry Weltman ranks in the 32th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added World B. Free to CLE.
  • Lost Ron Brewer to GSW.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Chris Dudley to BRK.
  • Lost Žan Tabak, Richard Petruška to CLE.

Signing Rating:

F

Harry Weltman ranks in the 16th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:

  • Signed Duane Washington in 1988.
  • Signed Ricky Wilson in 1988.
Their worst signings:

  • Signed Sam Lacey in 1982.
